item.title: Video Editor for How-To Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced video editor to help us complete more than 5,000 'How-To' videos. Each video should be approximately 1 minute long. The editor will be responsible for editing and enhancing the footage, adding text overlays, music, and ensuring a polished final product. The successful candidate should have a keen eye for detail, strong storytelling skills, and proficiency with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. This is a great opportunity to work on a large-scale project and establish a long-term working relationship. Interested candidates may apply with samples of their previous work.


Posted On: June 29, 2024 11:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: BGD
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Podcast video editor (regular podcasts - weekly)

NB -
Must be available for regular communication and fluent in English. Ideally from West Indies, but not a deal breaker.

Must be familiar with AI tools such as Leonardo AI, Dup Dub AI, and Canva, etc.

Must have experience with podcasts, video editing, graphic overlay, graphic design.

An accessible portfolio of past podcast work must be available to view.

This could lead to a lot of ongoing work for the right person.

item.title: Video Editor For ASMR Cooking YouTube Channel (Long Form 10-15 mins. Vids, Short Form & Thumbnails) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello. I'm looking for video editor for a ASMR cooking YouTube channel. The videos have no talking, no music, just pure cooking sounds. It's kind of ASMR for food. The setting is in nature, and there's a lot of nature shots as well.

RAW footage will be provided for each video, and the output should be 4K. Your primary job will be to go through all the footage and splice together a 10-15 min video. In some cases, you may need to fix sound (remove talking, or background noises).

From those long form videos, I want to get, if possible, 2 short form videos too, for YouTube Shorts and Instagram Reels. We're looking for some creative individuals that know how to make interesting short form content.

Also, I consider it a big plus if you make sick thumbnails. For images and things you may need from me, I will do my best to provide. When recording the videos, I will be sure to take some 4K images that we can use for thumbnails.

Video examples of what I'm looking for:
SEE ATTACHED DOCUMENT FOR LINKS

My budget is $15 per long form video & $5 per short form.

Please apply by sharing your ideas and ways you think you can help me in DMs. Also, it's important that you send me your portfolio too.

Apply only if you work on Adobe Premiere.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 29, 2024 10:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Digital Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Digital Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design, Motion Graphics
Country: Macedonia
click to apply

item.title: Looking for 2d Stick Figure Animator - Upwork
item.description:
I’m looking for an experienced animator to join my production team on a growing youtube channel.

Duties:
You’ll be given a voice-over audio file and a script with detailed animator instructions. Your job will be to create stick figure drawings, scenes, and animations to produce an engaging and fun-to-watch video.

Requirements to Apply:

- Adobe Animate, Premiere Pro
- Good English communication skills
- Artistic ability to copy a specific style of illustration
- Ability to draw quickly for a quick turnaround
- Attention to detail
- Good communication
- Be willing to ask questions to clarify instructions if you don’t understand
- Turn in work on time

The videos will need to be in a similar style as below.:

https://youtu.be/peVsSYsijV4?si=_tlpM3Jy6t_v4TSB
https://youtu.be/nV6ZvNDb7pI?si=Vylz-j_l-jgb_6Sg
https://youtu.be/7mF-fzJrhtU?si=ttp2iJ5nw8q2t7Sh

Application Process:
- Submit your application with examples of work.
- A sample will be required in the next step.

Start your application with “Stickman” to ensure that you have read the job post fully. We will share further requirements in the next stage.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 29, 2024 10:38 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Short form video editor for social media - Upwork
item.description:
We are promoting a new brand by doing street interviews with random people and filming it to post on Instagram, Tiktok and Youtube.

We need help to edit the raw footage from each interview into one or more short form videos.

We are expecting you to take out the best parts, focusing on editing it to be funny and engaging.

Please provide samples of your previous work.

If your English is not your first language or on an EXTRAORDINARY level, please don't apply. Your English skills will be tested.

Kind regards,
Oscar


Posted On: June 29, 2024 10:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: CapCut, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
